thread.title: Nancy Inman Linder
thread.title_full: WebsiteBox.com reviewed by Nancy Inman Linder

author: Nancy Inman Linder
title: Nancy Inman Linder
text: I had made a request via a chat box and the response was a link to a FAQ that I had already looked at and wasn't the problem or solution. However, on the phone when they actually looked at my site as I asked my question, then he quickly figured out what I was asking and helped me fix it.
